name: Anime Pixel Girls
description:
Anime Pixel Girls is a game just like mosaic of individual elements that you need to assemble into an interesting single picture and then it comes to life.

Anime Pixel Girls will test the power of your thinking and the desire to see what was originally scattered on the table in the form of sliced ​​small rectangles. Like any board game, puzzles have a relaxation effect, because in order to collect a picture, you need to focus and show logical abilities.
Features: The original hentai pixel art, drawn specifically for this game. 5x4 game modes, nice relaxing music and 21 levels.
